auth.resetPasswordSuccess: Check your email for a reset password link. If you don't see it in a few minutes, check your spam folder.
auth.resetPasswordTip: Please enter your user account's verified email address to receive a default password.
auth.passwordTip: Must be at least 8 characters long and include letters and numbers.

btn.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this?
btn.deleteConfirmDesc: This will permanently delete your chat history and remove your data from our servers.

404.title: Page not found
404.desc: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for. Please check the URL and try again.

error.noQuestions: There are no questions in the current exam, please add questions first
error.promptError: This input contains inappropriate content, please repharse.
error.uploadImage: Please upload an image before generating
error.useDesktop: Please use the desktop version on a computer; mobile access is not supported at the moment.
error.gmailNotAllowed: Please continue with your Google account

chat.gpt4mini: GPT 4o mini with Image analytics, Code Interpreter, and File Retrieval
chat.gpt4o: GPT 4o with Image analytics, Code Interpreter, and File Retrieval
chat.claude3sonnet: Balanced and affordable model from Anthropic

folder.deleteDesc: This will permanently delete your folder and all chat records it contains.
folder.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this folder?

chat.deleteDesc: This will permanently delete your chat history and remove your data from our servers.
chat.shareDesc: Anyone with the URL will be able to view the shared chat.
chat.prompt: How can I help you today?
chat.footer: AI can make mistakes. Consider checking important information.
chat.name: LLM Chat
chat.desc: Interact with various LLMs (GPT-o1, 4o, 4o-mini, Claude 3, Gemini Pro, Mistral, etc.)

chatComparison.name: Chat Comparison
chatComparison.desc: Compare LLM chats simultaneously to evaluate performance

LLMBattle.creator: Creator
LLMBattle.question: Question
LLMBattle.name: LLM Evaluation Battle
LLMBattle.selectModelTip: Choose the model to participate in
LLMBattle.desc: Evaluate LLM models via Elo ratings in a chat-battle game setting

dify.name: Dify Studio
dify.desc: Develop LLM agents, chatbots, and workflows

autogen.name: Autogen Studio
autogen.desc: Create autonomous agent group chats to solve problems

sd.negativePromptPlaceholder: Describe what you don't want to see in the image
sd.promptPlaceholder: Describe your desired image specifications, details, and style preferences
sd.name: Stable Diffusion (SD, SDXL, SD3)
sd.desc: Generate images from texts using various Stable Diffusion models

lora.name: SD with LoRA
lora.desc: LoRA models adjust image styles to enable unique artistic creations

controlnet.name: SD with ControlNets
controlnet.desc: ControlNets add precise control options for enhanced image generation

hiddenart.name: Hidden Art
hiddenart.desc: Create visuals with hidden texts for various uses

dalle3.name: DALL·E 3
dalle3.desc: Generate images from text descriptions using OpenAI DALL·E 3

flux.name: Flux (Schnell, Dev, Pro)
flux.desc: Generate images from texts from various Flux models

questionGen.fileTip: Upload a file (lecture notes, book chapter, article, etc.)
questionGen.errorExtract: An error occurred while extracting text from the source. Please try again.
questionGen.limit: The extracted content exceeds the token limit of {{limit}}, only the first {{limit}} tokens are used to generate questions.
questionGen.question: Question
questionGen.name: Question Generator
questionGen.desc: Create Q&A from PDFs, URLs, or text, with answers and explanations

fillBlankWithOptions.tip: Enter your question, specifying where each blank should go. Then define the possible correct answer for each blank. Students must select correct answers into text boxes at each blank.
fillBlankWithOptions.correctAnswer: In the box below, every place you want to show an answer box, type a reference word (no spaces) surrounded by brackets (i.e. Roses are [color1], violets are [color2])

fillInTheBlank.tip: Enter your question text, then define all possible correct answers for the blank. Students will see the question followed by a small text box to type their answer.

multipleChoice.tip: Enter your question and multiple answers, then select the one correct answer.

shortAnswer.tip: Enter your question and multiple answers, then select the one correct answer.

trueFalse.tip: Enter your question text, then select if True or False is the correct answer.

quizBuilder.title: Title
quizBuilder.name: Quiz Builder
quizBuilder.desc: Build quizzes from question banks and export as different formats (PDF, Word, QTI, etc.)

questionBank.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this question bank?
questionBank.name: Question Bank
questionBank.desc: Efficiently categorize and save questions for quick, convenient access.
questionBank.collectionNameTip: Enter the name of the question bank.
questionBank.descriptionTip: Enter a description of the question bank.
